# Portfolio Rubric

## Assessment Criteria

Your Perseverance & Grit Portfolio will be evaluated based on three key criteria:

1. **Completeness** (40%)
   - All required elements are included
   - Strategies are thoroughly documented
   - Examples demonstrate application of concepts

2. **Reflection Depth** (40%)
   - Thoughtful analysis of challenges faced
   - Clear connections between strategies and outcomes
   - Personal growth insights clearly articulated

3. **Organization** (20%)
   - Logical structure and flow
   - Professional presentation
   - Easy navigation between sections

## Automated Scoring

| Score Level | Completeness | Reflection Depth | Organization |
|-------------|--------------|------------------|--------------|
| Excellent (90-100%) | All elements present with detailed examples | Deep, insightful reflections with clear growth evidence | Exceptionally organized with cohesive structure |
| Proficient (80-89%) | Most elements present with good examples | Thoughtful reflections showing some insight | Well-organized with clear sections |
| Developing (70-79%) | Basic elements present with limited examples | Surface-level reflections | Basic organization with some structure |
| Beginning (Below 70%) | Missing multiple elements | Minimal or no reflection | Disorganized or difficult to follow |

You will receive detailed feedback on your portfolio submission within 24 hours of submission.
